entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy and 40 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
